title: Zoku Hameln no Violin-hiki
original_name: 続ハーメルンのバイオリン弾き
sinopse:
In the dreamworld-turned-reality, Trom, Clari, and Cornet found themselves in the grimdark nightmare world governed by Fairy King Balailaika. In this world, the 5 Great Hopes discover an alternate story of each other as well as their past memories from the original prequel.

(Source: MU)
